hotels.title: Heritage-Luxe Malta Stay in the Heart of Sliema with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Malta may be small - but a stay at AX The Victoria Hotel will soon prove there is more to this Mediterranean haven than meets the eye. Stay in the heart of Sliema and discover its fascinating ancient history, compelling culture, flawless natural beauty and myriad hidden treasures. A typical day in this charming coastal town may begin with sweeping sea vistas at Upper Barrakka Gardens, followed by sightseeing at St. John's Co-Cathedral and the surrounding ancient forts, finishing with dinner at the Grand Harbour. Tucked away in the highly sought-after coastal town of Sliema, this top-rated hotel is characterised by contemporary touches, yet wholeheartedly honours the Victorian style that previously dominated the surrounding area. It sits less than two kilometres from the seafront and main promenade, where you will find an abundance of bars, restaurants and designer outlets. After days spent exploring, return to revitalising treatments at the spa or a cocktail by the city-view rooftop pool before dinner at the onsite restaurant.

hotels.title: Five-Star Harbour-View Malta Luxury with Rooftop Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Stay in the heart of Malta's upmarket Sliema resort town while relaxing in contemporary, five-star luxury at the stylish AX The Palace. With designer décor, superb dining options and a laidback-chic vibe, this is the perfect mix of comfort and charm. Spectacular views of the town, Mediterranean Sea and Valletta Grand Harbour can be admired from most rooms and public spaces. Dine at a handful of excellent venues; whether you’re craving Asian fusion, Mediterranean-inspired street food or coffee and burgers, you’ll find something that satisfies your tastebuds here. For a relaxed summer evening, head up to Lounge 360, the panoramic rooftop terrace with a gorgeous infinity pool, where you can enjoy a handcrafted cocktail with a side of breathtaking vistas. You can’t beat Sliema’s urban beachside location. AX The Palace is only minutes from the waterfront, where you’ll find restaurants, bars and cafés lined up along a coastline that’s perfect for swimming. Enjoy a warm summer’s night strolling along the promenade, while days can be spent exploring the historic sites of Valletta, only a 10-minute ferry across the harbour.
